Welcome to Road to IELTS. Click the buttons on the right to look at the resources to help with each skill.
The colour bars show how much you have completed in each skill area. Go to My Progress for more details.
Welcome to the Road to IELTS demo.
Please confirm your test date on the My Profile page.
First click to read the eBook. Then click to watch a video setting out the key facts in this section of the IELTS test
Click on a thumbnail to play the video
Choose a set below and start your IELTS language practice
Download complete test papers. Click the audio button to start the mock listening test. As in the test, you cannot pause the audio once you have started.
Download complete test papers with answers.
There is no downloadable test practice materials in this section. Watch the tutorials in the Advice and tutorials section to see what happens in the {courseClass} test interview.

How to use Road to IELTS

Road to IELTS is organised into four skill areas, one for each paper in IELTS.In each skill area learners can prepare effectively for their test by reading information about each paper, getting advice from experts onvideo, and practising specific question types using the interactive practice exercises and the mock papers.

Project Managers
Clarity: Joe Law
British Council: Greg Selby

Lead Programmer
Dave Keen

Video recordings
Andy Lewis

Sources of original articles and images
Photo images are taken from Shutterstock with permission.

Graphic of a windup radio. Reproduced by kind permission of the Freeplay Energy Group.

Tapescript
Alex Mackarow.

Every effort has been made to trace owners of copyright, but if any omissions can be rectified, the British Council will be pleased to make the necessary arrangements.
The Home screen is where you choose the skill you would like to work on.
The Skill screen is where you access the eBook, advice videos, and the interactive practice activities.
When you choose to work on an activity in the Practice zone, you will see this Exercise screen.

The British Council is an international charity that is committed to developing a wider knowledge of the English language and promoting the advancement of education to encourage cultural, scientific, technological and other educational exchange. The British Council was founded in 1934, incorporated by Royal Charter in 1940 and registered as a charity under registration numbers 209131 (England and Wales) and SC037733 (Scotland). Our Patron is HM Queen Elizabeth II and HRH The Prince of Wales is our vice-patron.

IELTS is jointly owned by the British Council, IDP: IELTS Australia and the University of Cambridge ESOL Examinations (Cambridge ESOL). The British Council has developed the content for Road to IELTS.

To find out more about booking your IELTS test with the British Council, click here: http://takeielts.britishcouncil.org

Clarity is an international publisher of online resources for teaching and learning English. Clarity programs have been chosen by thousands of schools and universities, and used by millions of students in over 110 countries around the world.

Clarity has additionally customised electronic materials for leading providers of English language teaching, including Cambridge University Press, Oxford University Press, Macmillan Education and the British Council, and has worked on large-scale projects for the Beijing Olympics and HSBC. Clarity has developed the design and software for Road to IELTS.

Technical problems
Clarity will be pleased to help you any technical problems. Email support@clarityenglish.com with a description of your problem and the URL of your course (if you are running online).
Clarity Language Consultants Ltd
PO Box 163, Sai Kung, Hong Kong
Tel: +852 2701 1787
Fax: +852 2791 6484

Clarity Language Consultants Ltd
PO Box 163, Sai Kung, Hong Kong
Tel: +852 2701 1787
Fax: +852 2791 6484

Content problems
If you have any enquires about the content, for example, if you have questions about an answer in the exercises, please contact British Council.

Upgrade?
If you would like to enquire about purchasing the full version of Road to IELTS, please contact Clarity.
This Test Drive version of Road to IELTS gives you all the IELTS basics.
Click here for a detailed user manual.

We would love to know what you think.

xRegister for the IELTS test with the British Council and you will receive the Last Minute version of Road to IELTS free!
xWelcome to Road to IELTS. Click the buttons on the right to look at the resources to help with each skill.
xThe colour bars show how much you have completed in each skill area. Go to My Progress for more details.
Welcome to the Road to IELTS demo.
「マイプロフィール」ページで受験日を確認してください。
IELTSのこのセクションに関する重要な情報について、まず電子ブックをクリックして読むか、PDFをダウンロードしてください。それからビデオをクリックして観てください。
サムネイルをクリックして、ビデオを再生してください。
以下からセットを1つ選び、IELTSのトレーニングを開始してください。
問題用紙一式をダウンロードしてください。音声ボタンをクリックして、模擬リスニングテストを開始してください。実際のIELTSと同様、リスニング問題の開始後は音声を一時停止することはできません。
問題用紙と解答一式をダウンロードしてください。
このセクションにはダウンロードできるテスト練習用の資料はありません。Advice and tutorialsセクションのビデオを観て、スピーキングテストのインタビューがどのように行われるか確認してください。
xYou have logged in anonymously, so your progress will not be saved after you close the program.
xOnly available in the Full Version. Click above to upgrade.

xRoad to IELTSは、4つのスキル（リスニング、リーディング、ライティング、スピーキング）で構成されており、それぞれのスキルはIELTSの各パートに対応しています。学習者は、スキルごとに効果的に受験の準備をすることができます。まず各パートに関する説明を読み、IELTSのエキスパートからのアドバイスをビデオで観ます。そして実際的な問題形式に慣れるためのインタラクティブな練習問題と模擬試験を行います。

x技術的な問題
技術的な問題が生じた場合は、Clarityが解決をサポートします。問題の詳細と、プログラムを開始したURLまたはウェブサイトを明記のうえ、 support@clarityenglish.comにメールをお送りください。
Clarity Language Consultants Ltd
PO Box 163, Sai Kung, Hong Kong
Tel: +852 2701 1787
Fax: +852 2791 6484

PO Box 163, Sai Kung, Hong Kong
Tel: +852 2701 1787

x内容に関する問題
練習問題の解答など、内容に関してのご質問がある場合は、ブリティッシュ・カウンシルまでお問い合わせください。
